1000010100001011 0101101100111011 0 -> sum: 1110000001000110, cout: 0
0010100101111100 1010110011110001 0 -> sum: 1101011001101101, cout: 0
1100001011110111 1001001011100000 0 -> sum: 0101010111010111, cout: 1
0100010010111111 1001110001001110 0 -> sum: 1110000100001101, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
